name: Digital Viscometer
tagline: Advanced digital viscometer system for precision laboratory analysis with ISO "9001":2015 certification...
overview: The AT-DVM-750 Digital Viscometer from Ativeer Solutions is a precision-engineered laboratory instrument designed for advanced analytical applications. Bearing Product ID DVM-75091, this instrument combines high-quality construction with cutting-edge technology. Built under ISO "9001":2015 certified manufacturing standards, the AT-DVM-750 delivers reliability, precision, and user convenience. Its robust design and comprehensive features make it ideal for laboratories requiring consistent, accurate results.
operation: User-friendly operation with intuitive digital controls, programmable settings, real-time monitoring, and comprehensive safety features including automatic shutoff and error detection.
considerations: Requires trained operators for optimal use
Initial investment offset by long-term reliability
compliance: Certified under ISO "9001":2015 and CE marked, ensuring compliance with international quality and safety standards. Manufactured in India at Ativeer Solutions state-of-the-art facility.
commitment: Ativeer Solutions is committed to delivering high-quality laboratory equipment with comprehensive support, warranty coverage, and technical assistance.
